title: SENIOR .NET DEVELOPER
description:
•	Produce detailed designs for software solutions that allow you and other team members to develop against
•	Understand implications of feasibility of systems design and integration
•	Contribute to maintaining architecture and design consistency across the team.
•	Define the coding standards in collaboration with the team
•	Contribute to defining R&D techniques including setting up proof of concepts.
•	Develope and amending code as documented in the design and ensure it meets the specification, follows standards, is performant and is maintainable
•	Contribute to code reviews both as reviewer and reviewee
•	Ability and flexibility to adapt with changed request to understand requirements and plan a solution
•	When production problems occurred, respond efficiently and effectively to address issues to minimize business disruption 
•	(Plus) Promote awareness of:
-	Emerging technologies and techniques
-	Test Driven Development
-	Object Oriented and SOA design
-	Use of Design Patterns (IOC, DI, MVVM, MVC)
requirements:
•	4+ years of experiences in Software Development
•	Experience of developing large-scale and complex business systems
•	Experience of developing effective user interfaces
•	Expert in Microsoft .Net, Microsoft SQL Server and other supporting technologies
•	Expert in Software Designs particularly Object Orientation and Service Orientated Architecture
•	Experience of Test Driven Development ,Continuous Integration as well as web service based integration
•	Strong development methodologies e.g. Agile/Scrum and iterative development
•	Good English communication skills
•	Must be younger than 1989
